game.name: Shattered Realms
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access

game.shortDescription: Traverse the Shattered Realms and reclaim the fragments of a broken world. Battle hordes of corrupted enemies, unlock powerful abilities and new Guardians, and conquer unique bosses in this fast-paced roguelite ARPG packed with loot, upgrades, and deep build customization.
